perturbation.original_text: 5.4 Payments. Unless specified otherwise, any payment to be made by Vericel under this Agreement shall be made within [***] from date of invoice. It is hereby agreed that the invoice with respect to any shipment will be issued upon the delivery date. The Parties' respective rights and responsibilities under Sections 5.6.5 and 5.6.6 of the License Agreement shall apply as such Section pertains to the Parties' performance under this Agreement, and are hereby incorporated by reference.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.4 Payments. Unless specified otherwise, any payment to be made by Vericel under this Agreement shall be made within [***] from date of invoice. However, for all invoices exceeding $[***], the payment term shall be extended to [***] from the date of invoice. It is hereby agreed that the invoice with respect to any shipment will be issued upon the delivery date. The Parties' respective rights and responsibilities under Sections 5.6.5 and 5.6.6 of the License Agreement shall apply as such Section pertains to the Parties' performance under this Agreement, and are hereby incorporated by reference.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by stating a general payment term of [***] days, but then adding an exception that invoices exceeding $[***] will have [***] day payment terms. This creates uncertainty as to which payment term applies to a given invoice and could lead to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: 5.5 Late Payments. Any payments due under this Agreement shall be due on such date as specified in this Agreement and, in the event such date is not a Business Day, then the next succeeding Business Day. In the event that any payment due under this Agreement is not made when due, the amount due shall accrue interest beginning on the [***] following the date on which such payment was due, calculated at the [***] for the due date, or, if lower, the maximum rate permitted by law, calculated from the due date until paid in full. Each payment made after the due date shall be accompanied by all interest so accrued. Notwithstanding the foregoing, a Party shall have recourse to any other remedy available at law or in equity with respect to any delinquent payment, subject to the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.5 Late Payments. Any payments due under this Agreement shall be due on such date as specified in this Agreement and, in the event such date is not a Business Day, then the next succeeding Business Day. Except for invoices that are under dispute, In the event that any payment due under this Agreement is not made when due, the amount due shall accrue interest beginning on the [***] following the date on which such payment was due, calculated at the [***] for the due date, or, if lower, the maximum rate permitted by law, calculated from the due date until paid in full. However, no interest shall be charged on late payments if the delay is due to Vericel's internal processing delays, provided such delays are documented and communicated to MediWound within [***] of the original due date. Each payment made after the due date shall be accompanied by all interest so accrued. Notwithstanding the foregoing, a Party shall have recourse to any other remedy available at law or in equity with respect to any delinquent payment, subject to the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by stating that late payments accrue interest, but then adding an exception where no interest is charged if delays are due to Vericel's internal processing, creating ambiguity. This creates uncertainty as to when interest will apply to payments and cause potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: 8.4 Termination by Vericel. Following the Initial Term, Vericel may, without penalty or prejudice to any other rights or remedies Vericel may have, in its sole discretion terminate or reduce the scope of any individual activities contemplated by this Agreement or any Additional Service or with respect to any Product or terminate this Agreement as a whole with or without cause, upon [***] prior written notice of such termination or reduction (which such written notice may be provided during the Initial Term).
perturbation.changed_text: 8.4 Termination by Vericel. Following the Initial Term, Vericel may, without penalty or prejudice to any other rights or remedies Vericel may have, in its sole discretion terminate or reduce the scope of any individual activities contemplated by this Agreement or any Additional Service or with respect to any Product or terminate this Agreement as a whole with or without cause, upon [***] prior written notice of such termination or reduction (which such written notice may be provided during the Initial Term). However, if Vericel terminates this agreement within the renewal term, Vericel shall incur a penalty equal to the cost of 6 months' worth of production, calculated using the averages for the production amounts of the initial term.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by stating that Vericel may terminate without penalty but then add a penalty if Vericel terminates within the renewal term, this creates ambiguity. This creates uncertainty as to when penalty will apply to termination and cause potential disputes.
